greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n OR 7n, where OR is bitwise OR.
comment: a(n) = 7*n if and only if n is in A048715.
It appears that a(n) = 8*n-1 if and only if n = (4*8^j+2*8^k+3)/7 for some j and k. (End)
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: f[n_] := BitOr[n, 7n]; Array[f, 55, 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 28 2010 *)
results.author: _Dmitry Kamenetsky_, Jun 21 2010
